name: Lost, Again
description:
You wake up stuck in a time loop, no memory of where you are or how you got there. Can you figure out how to get out before the loop starts again?

Lost, Again is a visual novel made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2022. It's my first attempt at video game making, and not much progress was made, but I decided to upload whatever I got done anyway. I plan to keep working on this - so watch out for future updates and progress!
